remarks: A kind of Aristotelian inference.  This judgement replaces the mode of inference ~ barbara when the minor premise has a particular context. Proposition 62 of [Frege1879] p. 52.  (Contributed by RP, 17-Apr-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: frege62a $p |- ( if- ( ph , ps , th ) -> ( ( ( ps -> ch ) /\ ( th -> ta ) ) -> if- ( ph , ch , ta ) ) ) $.
